languages.text: "Малатеки — это изгнанники, чьи идеи не перешли грань ереси, однако приблизились к ней. Их исторгают из структуры флота чтобы дать одуматься... и не позволить распространять крамолу". {n}Голос Паскаля звучит на удивление встревоженно.{/n}

"Malateks are exiles whose ideas have not crossed the line of heresy yet have come close to it. They are removed from the Fleet's structure to give them a chance to see the folly of their ways... and prevent sedition from spreading." {n}Pasqal's voice sounds unusually alarmed.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Малатеки — это изгнанники, чьи идеи не перешли грань ереси, однако приблизились к ней. Их исторгают из структуры флота чтобы дать одуматься... и не позволить распространять крамолу". {n}Голос Паскаля звучит на удивление встревоженно.{/n}

languages.text: 「マラテックは追放された者達だ。彼らの考えは異端というほどではないにしろ、それに近い。彼らは自らの愚行を反省するべく…それから治安妨害が広がるのを防ぐために、艦隊から追い出された」{n}パスカルの声は異様に不安げである。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Malateks are exiles whose ideas have not crossed the line of heresy yet have come close to it. They are removed from the Fleet's structure to give them a chance to see the folly of their ways... and prevent sedition from spreading." {n}Pasqal's voice sounds unusually alarmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「マラテックは追放された者達だ。彼らの考えは異端というほどではないにしろ、それに近い。彼らは自らの愚行を反省するべく…それから治安妨害が広がるのを防ぐために、艦隊から追い出された」{n}パスカルの声は異様に不安げである。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “黑暗贤者是一群流亡者。他们的思想还没有越过异端的界限，但已经颇为接近。舰队将他们逐出我们的行伍，让他们有机会看到自己的愚蠢之处……并防止骚动蔓延。”{n}帕斯卡的声音听起来异常担忧。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Malateks are exiles whose ideas have not crossed the line of heresy yet have come close to it. They are removed from the Fleet's structure to give them a chance to see the folly of their ways... and prevent sedition from spreading." {n}Pasqal's voice sounds unusually alarmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “黑暗贤者是一群流亡者。他们的思想还没有越过异端的界限，但已经颇为接近。舰队将他们逐出我们的行伍，让他们有机会看到自己的愚蠢之处……并防止骚动蔓延。”{n}帕斯卡的声音听起来异常担忧。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Malateks sind Verstoßene, deren Gedanken die Grenze zur Ketzerei noch nicht überquert haben, ihr aber sehr nah gekommen sind. Sie werden aus der Struktur der Flotte entfernt, um ihnen die Chance zu geben, ihren Fehler zu erkennen ... und um zu verhindern, dass abtrünnige Gedanken sich verbreiten." {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt ungewohnt beunruhigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Malateks are exiles whose ideas have not crossed the line of heresy yet have come close to it. They are removed from the Fleet's structure to give them a chance to see the folly of their ways... and prevent sedition from spreading." {n}Pasqal's voice sounds unusually alarmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Malateks sind Verstoßene, deren Gedanken die Grenze zur Ketzerei noch nicht überquert haben, ihr aber sehr nah gekommen sind. Sie werden aus der Struktur der Flotte entfernt, um ihnen die Chance zu geben, ihren Fehler zu erkennen ... und um zu verhindern, dass abtrünnige Gedanken sich verbreiten." {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt ungewohnt beunruhigt.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Les malateks sont des exilés dont les principes sont proches de l'hérésie, sans en avoir franchi le cap. Ils sont détachés de la structure de la flotte pour les amener à prendre conscience de leur égarement... et prévenir tout risque de révolte. » {n}Pasqal semble anormalement inquiet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Malateks are exiles whose ideas have not crossed the line of heresy yet have come close to it. They are removed from the Fleet's structure to give them a chance to see the folly of their ways... and prevent sedition from spreading." {n}Pasqal's voice sounds unusually alarmed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les malateks sont des exilés dont les principes sont proches de l'hérésie, sans en avoir franchi le cap. Ils sont détachés de la structure de la flotte pour les amener à prendre conscience de leur égarement... et prévenir tout risque de révolte. » {n}Pasqal semble anormalement inquiet.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Los malateks son exiliados cuya ideología aún no ha traspasado la línea de la herejía, pero están muy cerca de ella. Son expulsados de la estructura de la Flota para concederles la oportunidad de recapacitar... y para evitar que se extienda la sedición». {n}Percibes un inusual tono de preocupación en la voz de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Malateks are exiles whose ideas have not crossed the line of heresy yet have come close to it. They are removed from the Fleet's structure to give them a chance to see the folly of their ways... and prevent sedition from spreading." {n}Pasqal's voice sounds unusually alarmed.{/n}

Son expulsados de la estructura de la Flota para concederles la oportunidad de recapacitar... y para evitar que se extienda la sedición». {n}Percibes un inusual tono de preocupación en la voz de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Teküfranlar, fikirleri kâfirlik çizgisini geçmemiş ancak sınıra gelmiş sürgün kimselerdir. Filo'dan çıkarılmalarının iki nedeni vardır: Hatalarının farkında varıp bu yoldan dönmeleri için bir şans vermek ve fesatlığın yayılmasını engellemek." {n}Pasqal'ın sesinde anormal bir endişe seziliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Malateks are exiles whose ideas have not crossed the line of heresy yet have come close to it. They are removed from the Fleet's structure to give them a chance to see the folly of their ways... and prevent sedition from spreading." {n}Pasqal's voice sounds unusually alarmed.{/n}
